recipesJson.name: Milk in Honey (clone) or Remix
recipesJson.author: DodgerFog33
recipesJson.description: A clone of Cosmic fogs Milk and Honey.  To me this recipe is as close as I have gotten to the real thing. Needs a full 10 day steep for flavors to come together.

reviews.text: Never had the original, but this is pretty damn tasty

I'm giving this a 4 I've never had the original but I feel the tpa g.c.c needs to come down its a bit over powering and pushing the rest of the mix to far back this is at 3 day steep I'll try to  report back at a week or so 
Remember if you mix it review it !
